ext2

Class GroupDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ext2.DataBlock
      • ext2.GroupDescriptor

  • public class GroupDescriptor
extends DataBlock
    Name: GroupDescriptor This class represents a group descriptor in the file system. There are 'n' group descriptors in the file system. Each block group in the file system is represented by its corresponding group descriptor. Group descriptors can be used to obtain the iNode table pointer to find the iNode table from the block group.
    See Also:
    DataBlock

    • Constructor Detail

      • GroupDescriptor

        public GroupDescriptor(java.nio.ByteBuffer groupDescBuffer,
                       int groupNum,
                       SuperBlock superBlock)
        Constructor to initialise a group descriptor. Each group descriptor has it's own iNode table pointer to reference the iNode table.
        Parameters:
        groupDescBuffer - The byte buffer to hold all bytes for this group descriptor.
        groupNum - The group number which corresponds to this group descriptor.
        superBlock - The reference to the super block for file system information.

    • Method Detail

      • initGroupDescFields

        public void initGroupDescFields()
        Method to initialise each field in this group descriptor.

      • getBlockBitmapPointer

        public int getBlockBitmapPointer()
        Retrieves the block bitmap pointer field from this group descriptor.
        Returns:
        The block bitmap pointer field.

      • getiNodeBitmapPointer

        public int getiNodeBitmapPointer()
        Retrieves the iNode bitmap pointer field from this group descriptor.
        Returns:
        The iNode bitmap pointer field.

      • getINodeTblPointer

        public int getINodeTblPointer()
        Retrieves an iNode table pointer from the group descriptor. The group descriptor contains descriptors for all block groups. i.e. 3 block groups = 3 descriptors, hence 3 iNode table pointers.
        Returns:
        The iNode table pointer for this block group number.

      • getFreeBlockCount

        public short getFreeBlockCount()
        Retrieves the free block count field from this group descriptor.
        Returns:
        The free block count field.
